name: The Future of the Arctic
description:
The Future of the Arctic is a VR experience related to sustainability and global warming. In this immersive snowy environment, you will see some of the environmentally friendly renewable technologies that can and have been implemented into the Arctic region and meet some of its inhabitants and how they are so important for the ecosystem.

Originally, the experience was designed to be divided into two parts, but given some constraints, I ended up only developing the "good side" of it. For your curiosity, the other side of the experience was a predecessor to the released one where you would experience the effects of humankind's behaviours in the Arctic region in a near future.

This project was designed and developed as part of the module Real and Virtual Worlds of the MA Games Design course of the University for the Creative Arts.
